attributes.action: Take more notice of the feel of the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You only have to view a few websites to get the feel of Britain but they, "the Government" continue to ignore what people are saying and feeling. please it is so simple to get the feelings of this country, take the time view a few websites and you will find out what the people of this country want, you do not need "spin doctors"
